credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: Egg Timer and Stand
description:
1993-151-31a - The two-sided, x-shaped white cardboard stand is imprinted on both sides. A rubber band, wound around the center, forms the x and holds the egg timer in place.

Recto: The quotation begins on the left of the top strip and continues downward on the right, across the bottom, and halfway up on the left to the top:

        The time which we have at our/disposal every day is elastic; the/
        passions that we feel expand it,/those that we inspire contract it;/
        and habit fills up what remains.

The second half on the left is imprinted Marcel (cheers from M&Co) Proust.

Verso: On the top strip, 5 minutes is imprinted. Beginning on the left and continuing across the bottom and on the right is:

         If anybody/understands this quote,/please write.

1993-151-31b - A glass, hourglass-shaped egg timer is filled with white sand.

1993-151-31d - The wrapper is a crumpled reprint of an article entitled Three Scientists Say Travel Time Isn't So Far Out (The New York Times, Tuesday, November 22, 1988).
name: Egg timer
